ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.points

Class POICache

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.points.POICache

  • public class POICache
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to cache list of POIs in the surrounding The list of POI is converted to JSON, the corresponding bounding box is added to the JSON and everything is saved in the cache folder of the android device

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteCacheFile(java.io.File cacheDir)
      Deletes cache file from cache folder /!\ this function should be used only to cleanup the cache when the POI detection range has changed
      java.util.ArrayList<POIPoint> getCachedPOIPoints(java.io.File cacheDir)
      Returns the list of POI points from the cache
      androidx.core.util.Pair<int[][],java.lang.Double> getCachedTopography(java.io.File cacheDir)
      Return the cached topography map
      static POICache getInstance()
      Get singleton
      boolean isCacheFilePresent(java.io.File cacheDir)
      Checks if cache file is present in device Cache folder
      boolean isUserInBoundingBox(UserPoint userPoint, java.io.File cacheDir)
      Check if the user is located inside the middle part of the bounding box Using cached bounding box, a shrink-ed bounding box is computed.
      void savePOIDataToCache(java.util.ArrayList<POIPoint> cachedPOIPoints, org.osmdroid.util.BoundingBox cachedBoundingBox, androidx.core.util.Pair<int[][],java.lang.Double> cachedTopography, java.io.File cacheDir)
      Save downloaded POIs, bounding box and topography map to cache file

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static POICache getInstance()

      • savePOIDataToCache

        public void savePOIDataToCache(java.util.ArrayList<POIPoint> cachedPOIPoints,
                               org.osmdroid.util.BoundingBox cachedBoundingBox,
                               androidx.core.util.Pair<int[][],java.lang.Double> cachedTopography,
                               java.io.File cacheDir)
        Save downloaded POIs, bounding box and topography map to cache file
        Parameters:
        cachedPOIPoints - POI points to cache
        cachedBoundingBox - bounding box to cache
        cachedTopography - topography map to cache (3D MAP)
        cacheDir - path to cache directory

      • isUserInBoundingBox

        public boolean isUserInBoundingBox(UserPoint userPoint,
                                   java.io.File cacheDir)
        Check if the user is located inside the middle part of the bounding box Using cached bounding box, a shrink-ed bounding box is computed. The methods then checks if the user position is somewhere inside this smaller bounding box
        Parameters:
        userPoint - user location
        cacheDir - path to cache directory
        Returns:
        true if the user is in the middle of the cached bounding box false if not

      • isCacheFilePresent

        public boolean isCacheFilePresent(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Checks if cache file is present in device Cache folder
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - path to cache folder
        Returns:
        true if file is present. False if no file found

      • getCachedPOIPoints

        public java.util.ArrayList<POIPoint> getCachedPOIPoints(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Returns the list of POI points from the cache
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - path to cache folder
        Returns:
        list of POI Points

      • getCachedTopography

        public androidx.core.util.Pair<int[][],java.lang.Double> getCachedTopography(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Return the cached topography map
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - path to cache directory
        Returns:
        topography map

      • deleteCacheFile

        public void deleteCacheFile(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Deletes cache file from cache folder /!\ this function should be used only to cleanup the cache when the POI detection range has changed
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - path to cache directory
